content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a status of no fuel, currently has iron ore but cannot smelt due to lack of coal.
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) with a status of working, currently smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient fuel
- Ensure that there is enough coal or other fuel in your inventory to insert into the stone furnaces. Monitor fuel levels regularly to avoid running out during smelting operations.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure to check the status of the furnaces before inserting items. If a furnace has no ingredients or is full, it will not accept more items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has items available for extraction before attempting to extract. If the furnace is empty or the items are not ready, the extraction will fail.

### Errors related to furnace status
- Regularly check the status of your furnaces. If a furnace is out of fuel or has no ingredients, it will not operate. Consider setting up a system to automatically supply fuel and ingredients to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors when attempting to insert coal without having any
- Always ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running into this issue.
